item.description:
Hi everyone,

I am doing a walk next Thursday in beautiful Gloucester. We'll meet at 9:45 and start walking no later than 10am. If you are lost my cell is 508-472-7900. We'll meet in the parking lot. We'll have lunch nearby.

Directions

Western Avenue (Route 127)
Gloucester, MA
Telephone: 978.526.8687
E-mail: neregion@ttor.org
Get directions on Google Maps.

From Rt. 128 Exit 14, take Rt. 133 East toward Gloucester for 3 mi. until it ends at Rt. 127. Turn right and follow for 2 mi. to entrance
http://www.thetrustee...
item.name: Ravenswood Walk in Gloucester
